biotools.summary: Simple and reliable way to ensure that multiple DNA sequence data files represent the same individual person. This tool will identify any swaps that may have been made during wet lab processing or data file handling by ensuring that that two different DNA sequence data files represent the same person.

bioschemas.name: QR Concordance (QRC)
